projects.name: Guessing Game
projects.description: Made to test the potential of your guessing skills! Click start to enter a number. Once you've entered a number a prompt will let you know if you should guess higher or lower. If not, you have been informed that you have guessed the number. You may keep a score and do not have to restart. There are two levels. Standard or Expert. Depending on your confidence, give it a shot and challenge yourself!

projects.name: Progressive Web App
projects.description: An Ecommerce application with the ability to download on mobile smartphones. This app is certified as an mobile app by passing the PWA test certification. You are able to create an account 100% safe by using Bcrypt. Filter through what your needs and wants are in the products page.

projects.name: Semantic-HTML
projects.description: An example of what Semantic HTML really is. The difference between semantic and non-semantic html is between the tags and their meanings behind it's content. For example, the div tag does not describe any meaning behind it while an article tag does.

projects.name: MySQL Challenge
projects.description: A challenge made to result in the queries that are shown. Starting by creating a DB and dropping the DB if exist. The following queries are written to make Keys and Columns followed by inserting Values. Following queries will give the result of what is being asked for.

projects.name: LocalMotion App
projects.description: LocalMotion is a website made to help mend economic mobility in Charlotte, NC. Containing a SignUp page for users, informative pages of what we offer and how can we help as well as a contact page for those who want to help further or simply get in touch. Designed to fix the problem of economic mobility and to be user friend as well easy to navigate.

projects.name: Ecommerce Website
projects.description: An eCommerce Project developed as a Fashion Store of Plaid interest. Offering a Home, Products and Contact page with an amazing Back-end to Front-end connection! Using React, Node, Express and many more.
